DOC.brief_summary: Comparison of peak airway pressure and gastric insufflation in manual ventilation and pressure-controlled ventilation with facemask during anesthesia induction in children.
DOC.brief_title: Comparison of Peak Airway Pressure and Gastric Insufflation in Manual Ventilation and Pressure-controlled Ventilation With Facemask During Anesthesia Induction in Children
DOC.criteria: 1. ASA physical status with I or II 2. Those parents who signed with informed consents. 3. Children who are scheduled for elective urologic surgery (aged 6 month to 7 year) 1. Risk of aspiration 2. Oropharyngeal or facial anomaly 3. history of abdominal (stomach) surgery
